Reviews.Title: Like the laptop hate windows 8
Reviews.Author: David D Whitfield
Reviews.Content: Like the laptop hate windows 8I dont like windows 8 becouse they try to do the touch screen look without the touch screen

Reviews.Title: It's Ok for a reasonable priced laptop
Reviews.Author: Juan Fortis
Reviews.Content: This laptop worked fine for a few days, but then the screen turned completeley black, although I must say that HP customer service was timely. Now the computer has been sent to service and hoping it will be fixed.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Rovert2000
Reviews.Content: A bit mixed about windows 8, but laptop is pretty good. Video performance is decent, occaisionally a bit laggy. Not too bad for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price :)
Reviews.Author: ViSa
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my niece.  She is a college student and Loves it.  It is worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: OKAY overall
Reviews.Author: CynCyn08
Reviews.Content: These are the pros and cons.Pros:  Does what I need it to do (internet, Microsoft Word, etc); battery lasts pretty long; Very Light! I can quickly slip it into my tote bag and go to a coffee shop. This is a wonderful Coffee Shop Laptop.Cons:  Sometimes it's slow (not sure why, my techie friend will take a look); it's not the best for watching Youtube, as it often pauses depending on what you're watching; the keyboards feel a little hard to me (but that's cuz the last computer I had was very easy and smooth to type on)

Reviews.Title: Worst. Computer. Ever.
Reviews.Author: Tavelin' Woman
Reviews.Content: This CPU is at 98% useage with only 2 Word documents open - and nothing else running!  Forget playing even the simplest game, the response time is way too slow.Do Not Buy!  This is an incredibly inferior product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Brandon White
Reviews.Content: The value of the computer is way more than what you actually pay. good apps, fast processing and great battery life. No complaints. Excellent buy.P.SIt takes time to get comfortable with the Windows 8 operating system

Reviews.Title: This laptop has everything I need
Reviews.Author: R Glen Moorhead
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 takes a little getting used to. It is very different that Windows 7. I do like it now though.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Shajaira Quinones
Reviews.Content: I am a college student and I absolutely LOVE this laptop. I would reccommend it espcially college students if looking for a laptop.  Very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: HP 2000-2b19wm 15.6-Inch Laptop PC (Winter Blue) product review
Reviews.Author: Ncdv63
Reviews.Content: Soon after purchasing I allowed an update using the support assistant but it messed up the wireless network adapter, and I could no longer connect to a wireless network. I had restore the factory settings to resolve this issue. I no longer allow updates using the support assistant.The display also sometimes has slivers appearing on the screen, but the occurrence is becoming less frequent.Other than these issues it works okay.

Reviews.Title: Good computer!
Reviews.Author: wdbldr67 "wdbldr67"
Reviews.Content: It took me a minute to figure out Windows 8, but once I realized that the start menu is just an app based window it made more sense!  It is perfect for the work I do on the computer.  Not too expensive, but still gives me access to the programs and apps that I need to run my life!

Reviews.Title: HP cannot be trusted
Reviews.Author: Dizzy Daddy
Reviews.Content: i have purchase this product thinking it would be great. but after 2 months of using, it crashed on me keeps over heating. and i have been asking question about the quality of HP products to some of my friends they told me that don't ever buy HP products they're cheaply made and will not last long. yes the price is cheap but you better off buying a high quality laptop that will last for years. never again buying  HP products.

Reviews.Title: This Laptop screams slow !
Reviews.Author: Bcarson11
Reviews.Content: For 350 bucks, I was expecting a decent laptop, unfortunately this laptop isn't. I wasn't expecting a super fast laptop but this Laptop can barely load a webpage without locking up or slowing down. I'm a college student currently enrolled in a few computer science courses, and I need a laptop on hand to do my homework. Most of the applications that I have to download in order to do work, take up nearly all of the system resources and it slows the computer down to a snails pace, I can't even open some of the applications that I've downloaded, no matter how many times I re install. My old windows vista computer runs faster than this piece of plastic junk. Also windows 8 just doesn't suit me, it's supposedly supposed to make things streamlined and friendly, but it only slows down the computer and makes the most of the commonly used apps hard to find.To sum it all up, stay away from this laptop if you're looking for something for work or to just watch videos and listen to music. I would suggest getting something from Acer or Toshiba. Much more reliable. And stay away from windows 8 !

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Pocket
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop for about a week now, I was so excited to get it in the mail, When I got it I set it up and got everything I needed on it, its really fast and can keep up with all that I do, It can play Minecraft really good, and plays the sims 3 perfectly and Steam and downloads games really fast too, It's fast with uploading all my photos because I do photography, the Internet is fast, and the computer is amazing. I highly recommend this laptop for whatever you need it for, I love it. the webcam is perfect the mic is amazing so Skype is allot of fun as well. it runs smoothly and I am very happy I got this laptop. (: will buy again in the future. :D

Reviews.Title: Solid performer
Reviews.Author: O. Elmore
Reviews.Content: I wanted a larger windows computer I could upgrade over time, as I' have myself on a pretty strict budget. I have since added a solid state drive and installed Windows 7, put an extra 4GB stick of RAM inside, and upgraded the wifi card. The wifi hasn't worked out yet as this computer comes stock with only one antenna and I will need two to take advantage of the better card (at least I hope that's the way it will work when i get the extra antenna). The RAM has been great, however, but the best upgrade was the SSD and Windows 7. This computer is faster and smoother now, and all the W7 drivers were available and loaded with no problem.Specific to this computer: the keyboard is great for the price -- smooth with the keys spaced well and no flex underneath -- better than some more expensive laptops I've worked with. The CPU is slow for Hulu on HD but works fine a setting don; Netflix as well doesn't work well with HD turned on, but this screen resolution can't take advantage of HD anyway. Older games operate as they're intended at medium settings, but i wouldn't expect much more out of this CPU. APU graphics are fine (between 265 and 512MB with more available) -- that's won't be the bottleneck if you have a slowdown; it'll be the CPU.The beauty of the CPU is battery life. The battery lasts me all day with moderate use; part of that is the low power Sandisk SSD I put in, but the battery was doing just fine even before the SSD. It charges quickly. The original wifi card seemed fine, too; I just have some special range problems I am trying to solve. The computer is light for this size and price range, and it's solidly put together and durable. The model design is in no way ostentatious; that might be good or bad for you, depending on how much attention you like.

Reviews.Title: hp
Reviews.Author: C. Kitson
Reviews.Content: this is a good buy for the price, but when the item was received and booted up, i kept getting an error message and the laptop keeps restarting...yes it can be easily fixed, but what is the point of buying a new laptop to be getting all this trouble

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kathi Howell
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter in college she uses it everyday , she is very happy with this computer.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: crystal Williams
Reviews.Content: Its sleek, has great specks, windows 8, web cam cdr  dvd blue ray drive and you can't beat the price. i just love it.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: S. WILSON "SUSAN A*K*A CUPCAKE"
Reviews.Content: At first when I seen it in the store I was in love and especially for the price, I also was on a brand new laptop hunt and I wanted something nice and fun but very large and can get the job done! I love this laptop, it has a whole bunch of apps to choose from. And it is very sleek and fast as well. I use to have a Dell mini laptop but I wanted something more bigger and a lot faster. I am a student and have to write papers for my homework assignment and finals all the time. Matter of fact this last week I had to type up a paper and I used this laptop for the first time, and I loved it!! I also can play games on here as well. And one of the best tools I learned that they had for this laptop was that you can go to your photo gallery and they have a Facebook button at the top, so you can send a pic or more directly from your photo gallery to your Facebook page. Now that's genius!! I love my big & beautiful laptop it's definitely a winner for me.

Reviews.Title: Laptop is very nice. Windows 8 is funky
Reviews.Author: Mark Eisner
Reviews.Content: The laptop features are great. I like windows 8 look but functionality weird. Very much worth the price. Recommend it

Reviews.Title: It's HP
Reviews.Author: Kevin ONeal
Reviews.Content: It's HP enough said...  What can you say about the best computer products on the planet??? Like I said it's HP!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: thanks for nothing
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: Well bought this laptop thinking ok it wont be perfect but it will work but I should realized that it is horrible webcam doesn't work screen freezes at random and actually gives me over usage alerts when im not doing anything

Reviews.Title: HP is in denial
Reviews.Author: bob r
Reviews.Content: I've only had mine for a few days, so it's tough to rate on the merits of performance, just yet. Windows 8 is actually pretty cool. I expected to be frustrated for awhile, but I'm adapting quite easily.The main reason for the early review is that I did have a software issue and HP's tech support was exceptional. I had to do a complete recovery and that takes time, so I dealt with a few different people and they were all equally well-trained and customer-oriented.I was especially impressed by this because I have had some bad experiences with HP before.UPDATE.4 issues in 30 days, 2 of which were wireless related. I like the machine, if I could only get one that works. HP refuses to acknowledge that this one is defective and has been unwilling to replace it, so far. They'd rather waste tech time (10+ hours and counting), repair time and shipping costs, not to mention goodwill.Windows 8 is ok. There are parts of it I like, parts I don't and parts I have to get used to.Again, this low rating is mostly about HP. The product concept is good. Enough machine at a good price for someone low tech, like myself.I would buy if made by someone else.

Reviews.Title: hey every one
Reviews.Author: the finder and teller
Reviews.Content: hey u can by this at walmart for 297 trust me i got my dad one so why you got this so high and it look used

Reviews.Title: great deal for students
Reviews.Author: Dijanam
Reviews.Content: we got one for my sister as replacement for almost two years old HP Pavilion (we replaced the screen twice during that time, and due to the limited guarantee figured out its not worth keeping it at all). Those two repairs cost us more than this one computer. It came with the software and even if it lasts only a year, its definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Family laptop only
Reviews.Author: J-Lee
Reviews.Content: This is more a family laptop. Watching 1080p HD videos online is very choppy, all most un watch able. This is good for music, DVD, picture, browsing the internet and nothing else. Windows 8 is not bad, you just have to play around with it. Window 8 is really fast.

Reviews.Title: Love it...Hate Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Colleen A Carney
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this computer, but...Windows 8 stinks.  I probably will purchase Windows 7 separately just to make this functional for me!

Reviews.Title: Shame on HP for not sticking with Windows 7 -- Windows 8 is for tablets not computers!
Reviews.Author: theagle
Reviews.Content: Ordered this HP computer to replace my HP laptop with Windows 7.  Imagine my surprise when I booted it up and the screen had the look of my Kindlefire HD (I have 2 of these).  My desktop computers both run Windows 7 and I was definitely not ready to deal with yet another Microsoft "experiment" like Vista (oh yes, I got stuck with one of those when I first replaced my beloved XP but converted it to Windows 7 as soon as it was available).  Needless to say I abosolutely did not want nor need another TABLET!  While I am not a novice, it was exceedingly difficult to "learn" Windows 8 and then, was encouraged electronically by Microsoft to "upgrade" to Windows 8.1 because it would run smoother.......yeah!!  It only took 3 days and a call to India to reach an HP tech who magically got "inside my computer" and did some strange things to make it work almost the way it should have done in the beginning.  She got rid of the Internet Explorer 11 that came with the 8.1 and generally straightened it out so that I can at least use it now.  But I am really disappointed in HP and Microsoft for inflicting this on an unsuspecting public.  I can see that Microsoft wants everything now to be an "ap" instead of real software because it's cheaper to sell.  We are probably all doomed anyway to have Windows 8 until they come out with Windows 9 in 2015 to fix this mess.

Reviews.Title: PC had problems
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought thought Amazon, rather than Best Buy, because Amazon has never disappointed before. This computer started crashing as soon as I started using it. The problem seems to have been resolved through HP. I contacted them by phone and they updated the computers bios.  I am very disappointed with Amazon, this took a lot of time and was frustrating. I will think twice before ordering electronics through Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 was never really installed!
Reviews.Author: savannah
Reviews.Content: It was a scam! It worked perfectly until It rebooted itself and I got a message telling me to press F2 and telling me that nothing was downloaded onto the hard drive. It was literally a shell of a computer and has caused me to have to wait until next semester to take my classes. People need to understand how this affects other people's lives. I am an active duty military member who had to have two spinal surgeries in the past two weeks and NEEDED to cram to get everything done asap. This setback was the final straw. Ugh so disappointed.

Reviews.Title: my new laptop
Reviews.Author: Dianna Trend "Treasures"
Reviews.Content: use it daily windows 8 is way different from windows 7 but I just go to the desktop when I go  on line so I found that eaiser so I can open one window at a time.  if you go to the window viewed that you see in the picture you can only open one window. What I like about my laptop every time I close it the laptop empties out you place that saves where you been automatic so you do not run out of memory space on your hard drive. Once you get used to it the laptop is easy to use.  I enjoy my laptop very well. I love it great machine!!!  It never gets hot on my lap at all am on line while watching tv!! The color is very pretty to me I like  blue laptops!!!!!!!!!!Runs great as well is very fast  almost no loading time at all!  have played one game on it the sims 3 with no problems at all!!!!!!!!!watched movies on youtube with no drag this laptop does everything I want with no problems am enjoying having it!!!Thanks amazon a great laptop at a fair price well worth it!

Reviews.Title: It's not a mac, but...
Reviews.Author: M. L. Davidson "dessert goddess"
Reviews.Content: After six years using a Mac, it took me a while to warm up to this, but it works, it's small and light and we've become friends.

Reviews.Title: It's slow. It's made out of cheap plastic.
Reviews.Author: Karen Cartagena
Reviews.Content: It's a big disappointment.  The encasing is cheap. Support from HP has been totally lacking.  I will never buy an HP laptop again

Reviews.Title: A decent laptop for the price.
Reviews.Author: Review9
Reviews.Content: Pros:* affordable new laptop* battery lasts as advertised.* attractive* The webcam is of good quality.* Good build overall except the keyboard (it looks cheap).Cons:* a little slow (processor got the minimum subscore of 3.3 on Windows 8 rate this computer option)* The screen is bright but tends to reflect everything in front of it whether you are using in under the sun or in a bright room.* No dedicated num pad* Poor screen resolution.I have installed Microsoft word 2007, ADOBE CS5, and downloaded some apps; everything is working fine so far. Windows 8 boot up really fast. Have not experienced any problem with it except for a little sluggish performance time to time.Bottom lineThere are Tablets and netbooks that cost more than this laptop. That alone should tell you what you can expect from it. As long as the budget is concerned, this is a recommendable laptop.

Reviews.Title: Very little RAM for Windows 8!
Reviews.Author: Camryn Apple
Reviews.Content: There was only 2 GB of RAM on this computer, so I had to take it to a computer store to add 4 more GB of RAM to it... It DOES make a difference!  I'm NOT happy about Windows 8 operating system... I DO know how to use Windows 8 because I'm smart enough to figure things out on my own, BUT... I am REALLY hoping to downgrade to Windows 7 because I like Windows 7 so much better!  Windows 8 is just STUPID to me... It's all about apps and constantly has things running on the computer that slows down the speed of the computer... There's A LOT of useless and unnecessary features on Windows 8 that I could do without!

Reviews.Title: My 14 year old son likes it.
Reviews.Author: Neal Robertson
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my 14 year old son, and he uses it for homework, games, and surfing the internet.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Judith K Pickinpaugh
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he is slowly getting used to using it.  So far I have not enjoyed doing much with Windows 8.  I have Windows 7 on my PC and would rather use that program.

Reviews.Title: Fast Service and nice product
Reviews.Author: Harvey C. Wray
Reviews.Content: I received my computer on day it was promised. Have been pleased with it so far. The Microsoft 8 takes a little getting used to as I used Windows XP before.

Reviews.Title: yes
Reviews.Author: DeWayne Jacobs
Reviews.Content: I love my computer I haven't been off it since I got it... The price wasn't bad either!! I received my computer the day they said I would get it

Reviews.Title: Do Not But This
Reviews.Author: W. S. Holderer "operaPSM"
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this computer.  It has so many problems that I have neither the time nor inclination to list them all but avoid this computer.  I had an HP about ten years go and liked it but this model is not worth the price, cheap though it may be.

Reviews.Title: Nice computer for the bucks, with no software and I hate Windows 8
Reviews.Author: John57106
Reviews.Content: Be warned that this computer is bare bones and we have had to add software for word processing. Windows 8 sucks (to put it nice) and we came from an old Vista system. Microsoft decided that PEOPLE don't use computers for playing DVD, so they included NO way to play them, per Microsoft, people stream, they don't play DVDs. Nice of them to make this decision on my behalf, you can buy software to play DVDs, by the way it cost $119. The HP instructions were more than poor and I had to go on line to learn the basic operations.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Laney
Reviews.Content: Do not get this laptop. I received it and returned it within the week. First off, Windows 8 SUCKS! I even upgraded to Windows 8.1 and still was unhappy with the user capability. Secondly, this computer's operating system is soooooo slow. I was just trying to play a regular old DVD and the lag time was infuriating. I got this specifically to surf the web and watch Hulu, which the reviews said it was good at. It was so slow, I had to refrain from throwing it through the window almost every time I tried to use it.On a good note, Amazon was amazing, as usual as returning and refunding me.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 failure
Reviews.Author: John W. Winchester
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 failureTo Amazon.comOn January 9 I purchased a HP 2000-2b19wm 15.6-Inch Laptop PC with Windows 8.Order #108-9088880-3770606 Sold by Pavilion ElectronicsThis was to replace my old but still working Windows Vista PC.I use the PC at home for email, internet connection to personal records, and general e-reading.Windows 8 has failed to perform up to my expectation, in spite of upgrading to Windows 8.1.Yesterday another Windows 8 upgrade occurred automatically overnight.With this latest upgrade the PC now no longer connects to my email account.I want to change to a PC with a workable operating system.Can I install another operating system on this PC, e.g. Windows 7?Or can I exchange this PC for a PC with Windows 7 already installed?Please forward this message to someone to advise me.Thank you.John W. WinchesterProfessor Emeritus, Florida State University5/18/14

Reviews.Title: Stay away!
Reviews.Author: Molokaicreeper "maccentris"
Reviews.Content: Sorry but this laptop is not worth what it's being sold for here at Amazon.  I paid considerably LESS in Wal-mart's website for this laptop in February.  When I say considerably please add a couple of zeros to that.  Nevertheless, I feel I was ripped off.  My 3 year old Acer laptop was way faster than this, and I had to replace it due to a broken fan (overheating and shutting off).I think I would rather use a laptop platform fan on my old Acer which is still pushing for another year, good old trusty thing.As far as speed let me do you all a favor, I have SAME MODEL I double checked and this is what it says:AMD E-300 APU with Radeon(tm) HD Graphics 1.3Ghz^ YES you read that right: 1.3Ghz (or technically 1,333 Mhz)SAVE YOUR MONEY!!  I hear Best Buy has better computers for $250 than this.  If that fails, there is always Walmart's website.

Reviews.Title: A Very Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: Deborah Armando
Reviews.Content: It came on time and is very pretty.  I have had no problems with set-up or with learning the new windows system.  The only concern is that I ordered a brand new one, and it is clear that somebody has been using this one.  Someone had already created an avatar and established a score record for the Spider Solitaire game.  When I pay for something brand new, I expect to be the first person who uses it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY HP2000
Reviews.Author: sonja macleod
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY HP 2000 IT IS SO PRETTY AS WELL . THE ONLY THING I DON'T LIKE IS HOW THEY PUSH WINDOWS 8.1 I HAVE A HARD A NOFE TIME LURING THE ONE THAT'S ON THE COMPUTER

Reviews.Title: great for its price
Reviews.Author: kyle sonksen
Reviews.Content: given the price and what it was built to do, it works fine, but for people who do more exotic stuff (i do online gaming and 3d animating) it isn't the best choice. it is limited by the fact that some of the important parts can't be swapped for better. all in all though, if you just need to watch small videos, e-mail, its fine small things.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ashley Andrews
Reviews.Content: great purchase; reasonable price; packed well; shipped on time!  I believe it's actually black instead of winter blue as it says but that's even better!

Reviews.Title: unsatisfactory
Reviews.Author: William F. Keaster
Reviews.Content: windows 8 absorbed all the memory that came with the computer leaving no memory to operate the computer programs. did not care for the apps .

Reviews.Title: My very own
Reviews.Author: Charmo
Reviews.Content: So far so good am enjoying my first computer very much no regrets on the price I use it every day no problem

Reviews.Title: Great deal...
Reviews.Author: Susanne W.
Reviews.Content: This has worked out so well for my job.  Everything works great and is easy to use.  Like that it is wi-fi friendly.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: china56
Reviews.Content: I was please with my HP computer, it is great for people, that does NOT want to do a lot of work on computer, I am enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Gia
Reviews.Content: This laptop has kept all of the promises made in its description!  I mostly use it for internet and Office.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: why did this happen amazon.com?
Reviews.Author: Christopher Beagle
Reviews.Content: When i recieved my package the clip that held the battery in the laptop was gone. also acompanied by a bad charger that cant  charge the laptop efficiently. i regret buying. the laptop online

Reviews.Title: it is okay but slow and windows 8 is not user friendly
Reviews.Author: Bessie Poe
Reviews.Content: Much slower than I expected, and I had an awlful time with windows 8, make a user account, password not long enough not enough numbers and so on. Turns out this account wasn't needed to the machine up and running. The Charms are so dumb and so fickle. The laptop was its self had issues, the cd drawer wouldn't open, then the touch pad ( instead of a mouse) was so unstable, it would work fine on minute then not at all. I would not buy another, maybe I bought a slow one, I just know my Daughter's laptop is old several brothers used in school before her it runs windows xp  and it is twice as fast. it is fancy looking and seems durable, but way too slow and too much of a windows failure to be of much use, card games maybe?

Reviews.Title: Good performance, to many pop ups
Reviews.Author: Gretchen Simpkins
Reviews.Content: It's performance is really good, it doesn't crash. It also doesn't run slow for the most part. Only down side is there are tons of pop ups that get super annoying.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Lori F Douglas
Reviews.Content: The computer is larger than my previous laptop...the screen is larger....it arrived in good condition.....I was very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excelent laptop considering the price
Reviews.Author: ROMULO
Reviews.Content: It's an opportunity to buy a good hp product for reasonable price. I'm having a new experience using windows 8.

Reviews.Title: prompt & exactly as I ordered
Reviews.Author: Joe Kopacz
Reviews.Content: I am not really happy with the HP product this is not the fault of the shipper.  I got exactly what I ordered.  I have used a Dell lattitude for years & I find it very difficult to get used to this HP.  I hate the keyboard!

Reviews.Title: what happen to HP
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: I bought an hp dv2000 back in 2007 . i had it for 6 years worked great till the day  I BROKE IT. So i bought this garbage i figured for what i use it for it would be fine. I found it to be a grand disappointment . After about a year the computer has completely slowed down , the keyboard letters dont work , freezes up among other things. I really just want to sell it and move over to an apple .I figured my samsung was crap and  went back to the iphone this must hold true among laptops as well

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kathleen B.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this laptop.  Especially since all of the software is pre-loaded.  Took very little time to update and was ready for use!! Great price as well..........

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Harold Arehart
Reviews.Content: if your looking for a performance laptop I wouldn't suggest this laptop rather get the MacBook though its expensive but its worth...but for the price this laptop does the job for like browsing the web and chatting.

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: Whitney
Reviews.Content: When i'm on a website trying to type something the keyboard is numb and I have to press rather hard to get the letter or w/e key i'm trying to type. it happens all the time and is annoying when I am having to write essays and such

Reviews.Title: Get one!
Reviews.Author: Sonja Gabilondo
Reviews.Content: I love my HP!!!! It is super user friendly does more then I thought it was a great price this is my first laptop and It's the best money I've ever spent!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: L. Chapman
Reviews.Content: Although I was happy with the overall product, I discovered after purchasing that the CD/DVD drive didn't work.  I would've like to have known that before purchase, but even if I had I still would've bought the item.  Everything else was as advertised and the price was great.  I am very happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: New computer
Reviews.Author: John R. Grcevich
Reviews.Content: I bought it because the laptop that I own had the battery dying.  The new one came with no problems from the vendor.  As far as the new laptop, it is not as easy to use as the previous one and I am not crazy about Windows 8.  The other computers that I have run Windows 7 which is much easier to use, but I don't think I am alone in that regard.

Reviews.Title: Came with out dated drivers
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: Garbage. Will the greed of computer companies never cease? HP doesn't even have the decency to sell a computer with updated drivers or offer a free update. You just lost a future customer HP. I won't buy a mouse from Hewlett Packard again.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. As someone else had said, they do not try to sell you all kinds of software. Nowadays most people easily can locate the desired software, so I appreciate that there were not a lot of software come-ons.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Tarza Taha
Reviews.Content: i have never ever used a lap top as much as bad as this onethe reason i ordered at the first place because it is HP which is always the best everbut this time it made me change my mind for sure i wasted the money

Reviews.Title: this computer
Reviews.Author: Sparkleprincess
Reviews.Content: i had got this computer from my college and honestly this is a horrible computer.. it had gotten so many viruses also it started smoking.. its really slow also and its hard to get wifi connections

Reviews.Title: Nice looking computer
Reviews.Author: Connie Halbig
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend of mine. I didn't realize it didn't have a CD or DVDRW  so now I need to get one for him that will work. But over all he is happy but now I am not And at $ 350.00 PLUS SHIPPING it should of had one.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Britney
Reviews.Content: Had this laptop for about 2 months now and it's been running great. I read a review about getting an external hard drive to increase efficiency which I did but it was the wrong size so I sent it back and didn't bother getting the right one...anyways It's good for a cheap laptop. Norton Security is just about to run up so I'll probably be purchasing  new security soon.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good...
Reviews.Author: Blackswan
Reviews.Content: I've only had my new laptop for a week and am still learning, so really hate to score it so early.  I will say I would have scored it a 5 had I not been struggling with the mouse being so loose (think I just have to get used to it) and the charm bar popping up when I slide the mouse on the right side anywhere on the screen.  It is supposed to only pop up it I go to the top or bottom right screen.  When it does pop up, it sends me back to start page...over and over.  Can anyone help me?  I've studied and gone online, to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Jury's Still Out
Reviews.Author: Jacob Chesley Clark
Reviews.Content: The laptop itself is fine and runs well.  My husband just hates Windows 8 with a passion so intense that it's nearly holy.  We'll see if he adapts and that changes.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised at how easy to use. I am not to computer savy .What I use it for it fits me just fine.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: mei
Reviews.Content: its nice. and very fast. For the price tag I paid. I used for weeks. nothing is wrong about it. I m happy.

Reviews.Title: A good laptop
Reviews.Author: Vikki E Henry
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop and am glad I did. It is a great value for the price. I will definitely buy HP laptops in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great computer for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Val Martinez
Reviews.Content: Purchased this computer for a relative which is learning how to use a computer. Its a good starter computer but don't expect to do much with it. Basically used for web searches and Facebook.

Reviews.Title: HP Computer
Reviews.Author: M. Nuckles "monkeythings.com"
Reviews.Content: This is a good quality computer.  Personally, like everything else, it takes a while to get used to a new product.  This has everything anyone would want or need on a laptop.  Excellent

Reviews.Title: computer is meh
Reviews.Author: Anna F.
Reviews.Content: It worked but it was super slow and I couldn't download firefox onto it. Windows 8 is pretty useless in my case. The mousepad rarely worked but that might have just been the specific computer I got. I returned it. I'm going to stick with Macs.

Reviews.Title: Good Product!
Reviews.Author: Andréia Costa
Reviews.Content: Good price and excellent quality! Gave to my sister for Christmas. She loved it! She is happy andI'm happpy!

Reviews.Title: Great little computer.
Reviews.Author: gnrhyne
Reviews.Content: Got the computer for my wife. We love the computer. It is fast, has lots more memory than she will ever use. Great screen. But we hate Windows 8, which is the operating system.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: John L. Sullivan Jr. "Birddog"
Reviews.Content: VERY SATISFIED. Product arrived very fast. Nice to have an up to date computer. So far so good. Windows 8 requires a little getting use too.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre
Reviews.Author: mgs1
Reviews.Content: disappointed.  I bought this because of the HDMI connection to run movies and the buffering is so bad - even with tweeking and every other conceivable issue, including removing Norton .. it's just bad.  This is a constant complaint from others.  UTube videos are even slow... for checking email, and surfing the web - it's absolutely fine.  be aware it is Windows 8 and there is a learning curve... also start-up is slow.  Lot's of updates on this.  Camera very mediocre.

Reviews.Title: Cool thing
Reviews.Author: prabina mohapatra
Reviews.Content: It is so cool. And also easy to acess to shortcuts. I like the way it works with dual processor

Reviews.Title: Great Choice for a present
Reviews.Author: yvettestanford
Reviews.Content: I bought both of these for my girls for Christmas! They were so happy, as one of my daughters will be adopted very soon. This was her first Chirstmas with us and the first one she celebrated in the last 10 years and she's 19!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: CRISTIAN GONZALEZ DE MAIO
Reviews.Content: Excellent product I am very happy with the purchase, it is more than I expected all very good, nice and cheap ... I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Basically what you see
Reviews.Author: Tara
Reviews.Content: I've had it about a month now and it works fine. It came in on time without any difficulties so I'm overall pleased.

Reviews.Title: came quick
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: The processor is a lot slower than I expected, but then again, I did not pay that much. My other computer died and I got this to temporarily replace it until I could afford one with all the bells and whistles. Choppy and slow on the video games. Otherwise it works ok.

Reviews.Title: laptop hp love it love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Awesomeness awesome laptop love the way it looks and works. My daughter's love to play games on it. The very best laptop I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, for the right price, its a good deal
Reviews.Author: Madalfa Castro
Reviews.Content: excellent machine, the price is good, and you get what you paid, no more, no lessits good for entry level

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Niejadlik
Reviews.Content: the price and quality are better than I expected, picture and the speed of the computer are clear and fast

Reviews.Title: Great price for a college student on a budget!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alicin Levy
Reviews.Content: This laptop is the best of both worlds, good deal and has the newest windows program. It is easy to use as well as a good size for a laptop. I use this a lot for school and I would recommend it to any student on the search for a decently priced alptop and one that will get the job done.

Reviews.Title: excellent laptop
Reviews.Author: luis pinto
Reviews.Content: excellent laptop, incredible material and finish, in performance, until now it is fast and works well. I recommend this laptop to the community

Reviews.Title: HP 2000 Laptop
Reviews.Author: DD
Reviews.Content: Received the laptop very quick! I was very happy with the computer! The looks and operation was very nice and it was exactly as advertised. I would recommend the laptop and the company to anyone.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: the windows 8 was a little hard at first to get use too now that i am use to it i like it you can do lots with it,the laptop its self  is pretty fast  you can play games on it ,email  watch movies  you can do most anything with it  over all its a good laptop

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I needed a new laptop that was affordable. This laptop has a great keyboard and it is able to be used with many different devices because of all the different ports that it has. It has met my needs and is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great Streaming Rabbit TV, Hulu & Nextflix va HDMI  Big Screen TV
Reviews.Author: Sharon K Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this solely to use  with HDMI cables connected to my 52" TV  WOW!!  works great!.  The Color on the laptop is off, yet transmits perfectly on the big Screen TV.  Oh, it comes with a built-in camera and Skype app.  The Windows 8 was an issue I had to work out.  Still not thrilled about it. but works wonderfully for the purpose in which I bought it.

Reviews.Title: GREATT
Reviews.Author: Nisi
Reviews.Content: I love it :) Windows 8 is a little annoying but is fine once you get used to it. Product came very fast. works well  !

Reviews.Title: very nice, the price is reasonable
Reviews.Author: PM
Reviews.Content: In general, it's very good laptop. It looks beautiful and Windows 8 is works very well. Just a little flaws with the process speed while running several WebPages.

Reviews.Title: Very nice PC
Reviews.Author: Lipton
Reviews.Content: This laptop doesn't have all the bells and whistles but is great for my needs and couldn't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: sylvia elkins
Reviews.Content: i really Love the HP 2000.  It's was really easy to set up and use. i really enjoy using it!

Reviews.Title: Its a solid computer.
Reviews.Author: Eric Anthony "Eric Anthony"
Reviews.Content: It don't have back-lit keys or a touch screenall in all I'm happy with the computer for the price.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: daniel m johnson
Reviews.Content: Not even a week and the screen stopped working. Maybe 5 times I used it for the time I had it.

Reviews.Title: Idioma
Reviews.Author: sammy cheng
Reviews.Content: the Product Details no revealed window 8 in english o Spanish, this is very important ! many people wanted to buy in spanish

Reviews.Title: NEVER TRUST THIS GUYS
Reviews.Author: Agustina Rodriguez "AgustinaRZ"
Reviews.Content: The worst parchase everDO NOT TRUST THEMAs soon as I opened it and tried it, I hate it.Is the slower computer, and when I complained they said there was nothing they could do about it.Horrible customer serviceHorrible productTerrible conditions.No respect for customers

Reviews.Title: Never again will I buy any microsoft product!!  Windows 8 is the worst ever...
Reviews.Author: Major Blunders
Reviews.Content: I dropped my HP laptop equipped with Windows 7.  I never really liked win 7, so thought I'd get the new win 8.  BIG MISTAKE!  First, the laptop is loaded with so much useless **** that the processor can't keep up.  How can I possibly describe Windows 8 without loosing my temper yet again...forget it...it's not worth it...JUST DON'T BUY THIS CRAP...

Reviews.Title: Still happy
Reviews.Author: paochev
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer as an all do what you can with a laptop and I must say I'm quite satisfied with it. The only thing that bothers me is the surface of the pad, it makes me feel like my fingers are getting exfoliated every time I swipe my fingers over it. I must say I was a little skeptical with windows 8 but as my advances on learning how to work with it I like it and hopefully with continue to

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Wanda S. Gilliard
Reviews.Content: Mouse sticks at times. Just getting use to the features.  why is it slow when starting up? this is sometimes a challenge.

Reviews.Title: Space Truckin
Reviews.Author: Cafe' Connoisseur
Reviews.Content: greatt computer but Windows 8 definitely stinks.Can anyone say Windows 7!! Redo windows 8 so it is easier to utilize .
